mapper.sql: GoodsID, GoodsName, BuyType, SuppCompany, Model,BuyPrice, PaperSize, PaperColor, UseType, GoodsProp, GoodsStatue, GoodsStock, BuyDate, GoodsImgUrl, Memo
mapper.select:
select
,
from goods
AND GoodsID=${goodsID}
AND GoodsName LIKE CONCAT('%','${goodsName}','%')
AND SuppCompany LIKE CONCAT('%','${suppcompany}','%')
AND (BuyType & #{buyType})>0
AND #{minbuyprice}<= BuyPrice
AND #{maxbuyprice}>=BuyPrice
AND #{beginBuyDate}<=BuyDate
AND BuyDate<= #{endBuyDate}
AND (PaperSize&(#{paperSize}))>0
AND (PaperColor&(#{paperColor}))>0
AND (UseType&(#{useType}))>0
AND (GoodsProp&(#{goodsProp}))=#{goodsProp}
AND (GoodsStatue&(#{goodsStatue}))>0
mapper.insert:
insert into goods (GoodsID, GoodsName, BuyType, SuppCompany, Model,BuyPrice, PaperSize, PaperColor, UseType, GoodsProp, GoodsStatue, GoodsStock, BuyDate, GoodsImgUrl, Memo, GoodIntro,Model ) values (#{goodsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buytype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{suppcompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{papersize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{papercolor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{usetype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsprop,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsstatue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsstock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buydate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsimgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodintro,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
select LAST_INSERT_ID() as value

GoodsID,
GoodsName,

mapper.update:
update goods
GoodsName = #{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BuyType = #{buytype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SuppCompany = #{suppcompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Model = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BuyPrice = #{buyprice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PaperSize = #{papersize,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PaperColor = #{papercolor,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UseType = #{usetype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GoodsProp = #{goodsprop,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GoodsStatue = #{goodsstatue,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GoodsStock = #{goodsstock,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BuyDate = #{buydate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GoodsImgUrl = #{goodsimgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GoodIntro = #{goodintro,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where GoodsID = #{goodsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update goods set GoodsName = #{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BuyType = #{buytype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SuppCompany = #{suppcompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Model = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BuyPrice = #{buyprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PaperSize = #{papersize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PaperColor = #{papercolor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UseType = #{usetype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GoodsProp = #{goodsprop,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GoodsStatue = #{goodsstatue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GoodsStock = #{goodsstock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BuyDate = #{buydate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GoodsImgUrl = #{goodsimgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GoodIntro = #{goodintro,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where GoodsID = #{goodsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
